oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Appalachian Tennessee Marble
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Appalachian Marble Company
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Appalachian Tennessee Marble. Appalachian Marble Company, Knoxville, Tenn. Produced between 1920 and 1930. Catalog of marble samples, installations, and other business related material. 27 pp. Some illustrations in color.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Marble; Marble quarrying; Catalogs;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
